description: Bell peppers baked with herbed rice, feta, and olives, served with lemony cucumber salad.

imagePrompt.base: Hyper-realistic close-up of Greek Stuffed Peppers plated elegantly on a white plate. Pure white studio background, natural window lighting, shallow depth of field. Showcase vibrant colors, gentle steam, and fresh garnish that highlights texture.
imagePrompt.enhanced: Golden-brown Greek Stuffed Pepper halves, brimming with herbed rice, feta, and olives, elegantly rest on a matte white ceramic plate. A vibrant side of lemony cucumber salad, fresh dill, and crumbled feta garnish adds a burst of freshness. Soft, diffused natural window light illuminates, creating gentle highlights and inviting shadows. Extremely shallow depth of field focuses sharply on the glistening filling and subtle rising steam.
